channel.title: FollowYourPath on STREET SIDE
channel.description: Recent content in FollowYourPath on STREET SIDE

item.title: Skate it Till You Make It
item.description: Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a skateboard that didn’t fit my style, no one would fault me for selling it. If I left a crew that disrespected me, no one would say that I had a commitment problem. But if I walk away from a seemingly promising skate route because my soul has other ideas, am I a flake?
